name: Citadel Escape
description:
You've been captured and locked in a Citadel on Planet Sirius X. As you are clever and ingenious, you managed to run away from your cell and intercepted the latest model of Space Flight Fighter Model X 314159265 - the fastest in the galaxy.

You have to fly through the maze of tunnels of the Citadel without crashing into pitfalls made of radioactive waste growing on the sides of the tunnel.

Enjoy Citadel Escape - free endless runner. How far can you go?

Challenge the speed! Now!
